answers.answer: what do you eat? a lot of things happen to deal with your diet. take some vitamin b12 that will help with the sleepiness. or it could just be mono or some other sickness.the tingle thing. everyones hands/arms fall asleep when you sleep. its cutting off blood flow. it happens. when youre awake...thats a different story. feel your muscles around your neck and shoulders? are they always really stiff? i had those same symptoms and it turned out that my muslces were so tense they were pinching a nerve in my neck making my arms and hands hurt. do your parents have insurance? because if they do you might be covered. are you in school?
get a thyriod test done ! i have all those syptoms from my thyriod . you aint too young for carpel tunnel ,all mine started around 17 too so dont rule it out ! good luck x x

I live with my dads ex wife it sounds weird so i cant be on my parents insurance and they wouldnt have any either . I havent started school yet but i am soon .  Now i am eating healthy but only the past week . It is very hard for me to stay that way . 2 years ago i maintaing a weight of 135 and then i boomed up to 190 very fast , i havent been to a doctor in years so i dont know what that could of meant . and my arms just started falling asleep in the past month its not normal it is all the time and it bugs . My sister is also a massage therapist and i  live with her so i always get massages on mneck and other places and she hasent said anything like i am super tense . I am going to the doctors as soon as i can but i have no idea how or what to do , i am basically on my own here .

Definately have your thyroid levels checked.  I'm also a thyroid patient and know these all too well.  A possibility for sure.Would also have your blood sugar and insulin levels checked for possible diabetes or insulin resistance.Good luck.
thankyou i will definitly do that . That helps a lot , =)

question: I am only 18 and i have no kids and i have had the same problem in oth of my arms i do nt know what to do  , i need to get insurance . My hands and arms fall asleep at night and i wake up feeling no arms or a tingle feeling , i will also be on my phone and the same thing will happen . Im too young to have carpal tunnel ! at least i thought i was . I am also always sleepy i am contantly sleeping , i get off work and i take a nap and when i dont see my boyfriend im sleeping , im not depressed i dont think at least , i have nothing to be depressed about . My hair is falling out my skin is irritated , and i get sharp pains in my wrists a lot . I know these things are not in my head trust me .  I am working on getting insurance , but in the mean tie what can this mean ??
title: my arms are falling alseep and some other symptoms as well
